context: My friend told me she saw the movie Captain Phillips. May I know some information about the movie and it's star cast?

Sure, I do and Tom Hanks is one of my fave actors. Has he written any stories for movies?
Yes. He has wrote the movie Larry Crowne. Have you seen that movie?
No, I haven't and what genre is Larry Crowne?
Larry Crowne is a Drama and Romance Film. Any other information you need about Larry Crowne?
Not about Larry Crowne, but maybe you can give me some examples of Romance Film.
Zack and Miri Make a Porno is a Romance Film starring Elizabeth Banks. Do you like her?
No, I have not seen her films and any other example?
entity: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
rec: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
resp: She is in Hunger Games and Power Rangers to name a few. I do recommend Zack and Miri Make a Porno if you have not seen it.
